experience: Rite Way Communications, owned and operated locally, is one of the Phoenix Metropolitan Area's leading innovators in installing and servicing state of the art telecommunication products and equipment at very competitive prices. We have over 25 years combined experience in the telecommunications and data fields.Though we specialize in Panasonic equipment, we are proficient with most telephone systems currently on the market. Rite Way Communications also offers a broad range of other products and services including specialized telephone lines that can save you money and/or offer features otherwise unavailable such as PRI Lines, T1 Circuits, and VoIP Telephony. We also provide Auto Attendants/Voice Mail Systems, IT Services, Network Security Cameras, and Audio/Video Services.Rite Way Communications provides excellent service and efficient solutions on any budget. The growth and success of the company is a result of good old-fashioned personalized attention to each and every customer.
